name: absord
body: |- wi(w0, wo(wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), c0), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cneg(c0))))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wo(wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), c0), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cneg(c0))), wcel(c0, cr))
stmt.pretty: syl(w0, ((abs ` c0)= c0 ∨(abs ` c0)= -u(c0)), c0 ∈ ℝ)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), c0), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cneg(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), c0), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cneg(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), c0), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cneg(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), c0), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cneg(c0))))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wo(wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), c0), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cneg(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), c0), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cneg(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

comment: The absolute value of a real number is either that number or its negative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
